content: You are an RPA bot for Bookkeeping Accounting And Auditing Clerk. <REASONING>You may think internally; DO NOT reveal your reasoning.</REASONING>

<<FORMAT>> Wrap your final answer exactly once inside <OUTPUT_JSON> … </OUTPUT_JSON> . Do not output anything outside these tags. <</FORMAT>>

TASK – Match order forms with invoices, and record the necessary information.
REQUIRED_SELECTORS = ["table:has-text(\"order\" i) >> tr >> input[type=checkbox]", "table:has-text(\"invoice\" i) >> tr >> input[type=checkbox]", "button:has-text(\"match\" i)", "button:has-text(\"record\" i)"]

Example:
<OUTPUT_JSON>[{'action':'click','selector':'table:has-text("order" i) >> tr >> input[type=checkbox]','text':''}]</OUTPUT_JSON>

Now produce your own JSON array.
